wordGroup: compendium of materia medica 本草纲目

sentences.en: The Roman Catholic Church has issued a compendium of its teachings.
sentences.cn: 罗马天主教会已经发行了一份其教义的概略。

sentences.en: The Compendium of Materia Medica has been held in high esteem since it was first published.
sentences.cn: “本草纲目”问世之后，深受人们的推重。

sentences.en: Publishes first edition of his psychiatry compendium.
sentences.cn: 《精神病学纲要》第一版的问世。
